channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Former FBI director Comey pleads not guilty to federal charges of lying to Congress
item.description: The former FBI director, who has long been one of President Trump's most vocal critics, was indicted last month on two counts stemming from his testim...

item.title: Justin Pearson, Tennessee Democrat Known for Activism, to Run for Congress
item.description: Mr. Pearson, a member of the Tennessee House of Representatives since 2023, will challenge U.S. Representative Steve Cohen, a fellow Democrat.

item.title: Trump Says Chicago Mayor and Illinois Governor Should Be Jailed Amid National Guard Tensions

item.title: How flights are impacted by the government shutdown. And, James Comey's arraignment
item.description: Air traffic controllers are facing a staffing shortage and the government shutdown is making it worse. And, former FBI Director James Comey appears in...

item.title: Joan Kennedy, Who Married Into a Political Dynasty, Dies at 89
item.description: The wife of Senator Ted Kennedy for a quarter of a century, she both basked and struggled in the reflected glare of a family constantly in the spotlig...

item.title: Why preorders are such a big deal for authors
item.description: Special gifts. Great stories. And economics too!? Can it be true? The Planet Money book is available for preorder.

item.title: Research on metal-organic frameworks gets the chemistry Nobel Prize

item.title: Greetings from the Mediterranean, where dolphins swim alongside a migrant rescue ship
item.description: Far-Flung Postcards is a weekly series in which NPR's international team shares moments from their lives and work around the world.

item.title: Nobel Prize in Chemistry Awarded to Architects of Metal-Organic Frameworks
item.description: The prize was awarded to Susumu Kitagawa, Richard Robson and Omar Yaghi for the development of a new type of molecular architecture.

item.title: How Nepal’s Gen Z Revolution Spiraled Out of Control

item.title: Israel Intercepts More Gaza-Bound Activist Boats
item.description: The Israeli military intercepted a nine-boat flotilla aiming to break Israel’s naval blockade of Gaza to deliver aid. The Israeli Foreign Ministry sai...

item.title: Israel Intercepts Another Activist Flotilla That Aimed to Break Gaza Blockade
item.description: It was the second attempt in as many weeks to breach the restrictions around the Gaza Strip. Neither have succeeded.
